definition: Mohamed ElBaradei (1942-), Director of International Atomic Energy Agency 1997-2009 and Nobel Peace Prize laureate
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Mr ElBaradei has been asked by opposition groups to negotiate with the authorities on forming a national unity government.
sentences.chinese: 反對派請求巴拉迪去和當局者就組成聯合政府談判。

sentences.english: The Bharati Antarctic research station, India's third Antarctic research facility.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉迪南極研究站，是印度的第三個南極研究設施。

definition: Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
Husain or Hussein (name)/Hussein (c. 626-680), Muslim leader whose martyrdom is commemorated at Ashura/Saddam Hussein al Tikriti (1937-2006), dictator of Iraq 1979-2003
Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
